verses.verse: <S%G1492>Behold<s%>, what <S%G4217>manner<s%> of <S%G26>love<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> hath <S%G1325>bestowed<s%> upon <S%G2254>us<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> we should be <S%G2564>called<s%> the <S%G5043>sons<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>: <S%G1223%G5124>therefore<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G1097>knoweth<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> it <S%G1097>knew<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>.

<S%G27>Beloved<s%>, <S%G3568>now<s%> are <S%G2070>we<s%> the <S%G5043>sons<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> it <S%G5319>doth<s%> not <S%G3768>yet<s%> <S%G5319>appear<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> we shall <S%G2071>be<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%>, <S%G1437>when<s%> he shall <S%G5319>appear<s%>, we shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>; <S%G3754>for<s%> we shall <S%G3700>see<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> he <S%G2076>is<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> every <S%G3956>man<s%> that <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G48>purifieth<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%>, even <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G1565>he<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G53>pure<s%>.

<S%G3956>Whosoever<s%> <S%G4160>committeth<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G4160%G458>transgresseth<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G458>law<s%>: <S%G2532>for<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the transgression of the <S%G458>law<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> ye <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1565>he<s%> was <S%G5319>manifested<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> take <S%G142>away<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G266>sins<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%>.

<S%G3956>Whosoever<s%> <S%G3306>abideth<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G264>sinneth<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>: <S%G3956>whosoever<s%> <S%G264>sinneth<s%> <S%G3708>hath<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3708>seen<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G1097>known<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

Little <S%G5040>children<s%>, <S%G4105>let<s%> no <S%G3367>man<s%> <S%G4105>deceive<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>: he that <S%G4160>doeth<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1342>righteous<s%>, even <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G1565>he<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1342>righteous<s%>.

He that <S%G4160>committeth<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%>; <S%G3754>for<s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%> <S%G264>sinneth<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G746>beginning<s%>. <S%G1519>For<s%> this <S%G5124>purpose<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> was <S%G5319>manifested<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> he might <S%G3089>destroy<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> of the <S%G1228>devil<s%>.

<S%G3956>Whosoever<s%> is <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4160>doth<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> commit <S%G266>sin<s%>; <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4690>seed<s%> <S%G3306>remaineth<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G3756%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G264>sin<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> he is <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G1722>In<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> the <S%G5043>children<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G5318>manifest<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5043>children<s%> of the <S%G1228>devil<s%>: <S%G3956>whosoever<s%> <S%G4160>doeth<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>neither<s%> he that <S%G25>loveth<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%>.

<S%G3754>For<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G31>message<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> ye <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G746>beginning<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> we should <S%G25>love<s%> one <S%G240>another<s%>.

<S%G3756>Not<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G2535>Cain<s%>, who <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> that wicked <S%G4190>one<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4969>slew<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G5484%G5101>wherefore<s%> <S%G4969>slew<s%> he <S%G846>him<s%>? <S%G3754>Because<s%> his <S%G846>own<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G4190>evil<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brother's<s%> <S%G1342>righteous<s%>.
<S%G2296>Marvel<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%>, <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G3404>hate<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>.

We <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> have <S%G3327>passed<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> we <S%G25>love<s%> the <S%G80>brethren<s%>. He that <S%G25>loveth<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> his <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G3306>abideth<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%>.

<S%G3956>Whosoever<s%> <S%G3404>hateth<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> a <S%G443>murderer<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> ye <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3756%G3956>no<s%> <S%G443>murderer<s%> <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G3306>abiding<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G1722%G5129>Hereby<s%> perceive <S%G1097>we<s%> the <S%G26>love<s%> of God, <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G1565>he<s%> laid <S%G5087>down<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5590>life<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G3784>ought<s%> to lay <S%G5087>down<s%> our <S%G5590>lives<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> the <S%G80>brethren<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3739%G302>whoso<s%> <S%G2192>hath<s%> this <S%G2889>world's<s%> <S%G979>good<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2334>seeth<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> shutteth <S%G2808>up<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4698>bowels<s%> of compassion <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G4459>how<s%> <S%G3306>dwelleth<s%> the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>?

<S%G3450>My<s%> little <S%G5040>children<s%>, let <S%G25>us<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G25>love<s%> in <S%G3056>word<s%>, <S%G3366>neither<s%> in <S%G1100>tongue<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> in <S%G2041>deed<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> in <S%G225>truth<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1722%G5129>hereby<s%> we <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> we <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> shall <S%G3982>assure<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G3754>For<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> condemn <S%G2607%G3754>us<s%>, <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3187>greater<s%> than <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1097>knoweth<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%>.

<S%G27>Beloved<s%>, <S%G3362>if<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> <S%G2607>condemn<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%> <S%G3362>not<s%>, then have <S%G2192>we<s%> <S%G3954>confidence<s%> <S%G4314>toward<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3739%G1437>whatsoever<s%> we <S%G154>ask<s%>, we <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> we <S%G5083>keep<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1785>commandments<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> those things that are <S%G701>pleasing<s%> in <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1799>sight<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%>, <S%G2443>That<s%> we should <S%G4100>believe<s%> on the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G25>love<s%> one <S%G240>another<s%>, <S%G2531>as<s%> he <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he that <S%G5083>keepeth<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1785>commandments<s%> <S%G3306>dwelleth<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1722%G5129>hereby<s%> we <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G3306>abideth<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%>, <S%G1537>by<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he hath <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%>.
